signature.title: SIGNATURE COMBINATION
signature.text: Individually tailored combinations of the latest technology and regenerative care.
signature.modalText: Individually tailored combinations of the latest technology and regenerative care. 80 minutes · €175 – €190 (depending on active ingredients)
signature.modalDescription:
The Signature Combinations combine Aquafacial with light therapy and selected regenerative active ingredients.

Each treatment is individually tailored to the current skin condition and combines cleansing, activation, and soothing into a holistic care.

What makes this treatment special
 •   Individual combination of technology and active ingredients
 •   Support of skin regeneration and balance
 •   Visibly refined, balanced skin
signature.modalSuitable:
For clients who desire a personalized treatment and value sustainable skin health. 

Notes 
 •   Personal skin analysis before each treatment
 •   Active ingredient selection individually
 •   Dermaplaning optional as an add-on

microneedling.title: MICRONEEDLING
microneedling.text: Targeted regeneration at a medical-aesthetic level for visibly renewed skin.
microneedling.modalText: Targeted regeneration at a medical-aesthetic level for visibly renewed skin.  80 minutes · from €140
microneedling.modalDescription:
Microneedling specifically stimulates skin renewal and supports natural regeneration. Through the finest micro-impulses, selected active ingredients are effectively delivered and the skin structure is sustainably improved.

Variants
 •   Cica Aqua EXO – Soothing & hydrating
 •   Salmon DNA – Regenerating & balancing
 •   PDX Exosomes Premium – Intensively regenerating

What makes this treatment special
 •   Precise application at a medical-aesthetic level
 •   Promotion of skin renewal
 •   Improvement of skin appearance and texture
microneedling.modalSuitable:
For demanding skin types, tired or stressed skin, as well as for targeted regeneration.

Notes
 •   Short redness possible
 •   Treatment interval individual
 •   Sunscreen recommended

aquafacial.title: AQUAFACIAL
aquafacial.text: Deep cleansing and intensive hydration for a fresh, clear glow.
aquafacial.modalText:
Deep cleansing and intensive hydration for a fresh, clear glow. 
90 minutes · €175
aquafacial.modalDescription:
Aquafacial is a multi-step facial treatment for thorough cleansing, gentle exfoliation, and intensive hydration. The skin is deeply purified, simultaneously soothed, and visibly refined.

The treatment includes cleansing, peeling, extraction, hydration, and protection – for an immediate feeling of freshness and a radiant complexion.

What makes this treatment special
 •   Deep cleansing without irritation
 •   Intensive moisture supply
 •   Immediately visible glow
aquafacial.modalSuitable:
For all skin types – ideal for dull, impure, or dehydrated skin.

Notes
 •   No downtime
 •   Perfect as regular care
 •   Can be combined with other treatments

ultimate.title: THE ULTIMATE RITUAL
ultimate.text: The holistic premium ritual for maximum regeneration, skin strengthening, and relaxation.
ultimate.modalText:
The holistic premium ritual for maximum regeneration, skin strengthening, and relaxation.
90 minutes · €195 – €235
ultimate.modalDescription:
The Ultimate Ritual combines Microneedling, Aquafacial, and light therapy in an exclusive treatment concept.
This treatment was developed to combine skin regeneration, barrier strengthening, and deep relaxation.

Variants
 •   Ultimate Cica Aqua EXO
 •   Ultimate Salmon DNA
 •   Ultimate PDX Exosomes

What makes this treatment special
 •   Holistic approach at the highest level
 •   Combination of technology and regenerative care
 •   Maximum skin strengthening and sustainable glow
ultimate.modalSuitable:
For demanding skin, with increased regeneration needs, or as an intensive premium treatment.

Notes
 •   Individual adjustment of the treatment
 •   Personal skin analysis in advance
 •   Rest time after the treatment recommended
